sentence: Mandela Barnes (D), state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski (D), Milwaukee Bucks vice president Alex Lasry (D), Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson (D) and nonprofit executive Steven Olikara (D), among others.

title: Democrats reserve $33 million in fall advertising in fight for Senate

sentence: That stands in stark contrast to one of his prospective opponents, Sarah Godlewski, the Wisconsin state treasurer who sought to break out of a crowded Democratic Senate primary by pouncing on the issue as soon as news broke Monday night.
title: Threat to Roe puts GOP on defense in 2022 battlegrounds

sentence: Wisconsin state treasurer Sarah Godlewski, who's running to challenge GOP Sen. Ron Johnson, traveled to the Supreme Court to shoot what appears to be the first Senate campaign ad since the news broke.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Overturning Roe v. Wade may not change 'basic contours' of election that favors GOP: Analysts
